channel.title: Blog on 5ysk3y Pwnz
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on 5ysk3y Pwnz

item.title: New Website Stuffs!
item.description: I thought it may about time I posted something given the fact that the site hasn’t been added to or updated in the last year or so. Welp, it’s time for an update!
item.content:
Howdy!

I thought it may be about time I posted something given the fact that the site hasn’t been added to or updated in the last year or so. Also because I’ve actually managed to push some new stuff to this site that I’ve had sitting in a development branch for the last couple of months– you may have noticed a change to the front page. This wasn’t accident! The latest HTB guide (more on that in a mo) and blog posts do populate on there too but its no longer going to be a huge list of stuff. Old “blog” posts that did exist on there have been migrated into actual blog posts, much like this, and the goal is to just make things a bit cleaner and easier to manage.

Going forward, I’m officially back on HackTheBox stuff as of this week and have been making my way through live boxes that I’ve not completed yet; it’s been around 6 months since I did anything with HTB proper, but writeups are being done in tandem with those and will drop with the retirement of their respective boxes.

That’s pretty much it for now. Thanks for stopping by!

5ysk3y

item.title: Happy New Year
item.description: Happy belated new year! I’m currently doing some more work on this after an extended break to handle IRL stuffs! Namely certs and the like; the plan is to now try and flesh this out beyond what currently exists, making the site more streamlined etc.
item.content:
Happy belated new year! I’m currently doing some more work on this after an extended break to handle IRL stuffs! Namely certs and the like; the plan is to now try and flesh this out beyond what currently exists, making the site more streamlined etc.

I also plan to upload further walkthroughs of boxes I’ve done, that have subsequently retired, on HTB/THM platforms, as well as generally exploring what else can be achieved with Hugo! Watch this space.

5ysk3y

item.title: Site Update
item.description: So, as per below, I set myself a few goals for the month and (tbh!) I think I’ve done alright. The majority of changes revolved around missing/fundamental things that I wanted to fix. See the post below for a list of the few things I’ve managed to do!
item.content:
So, as per below, I set myself a few goals for the month and (tbh!) I think I’ve done alright. The majority of changes revolved around missing/fundamental things that I wanted to fix. See the post below for a list of the few things I’ve managed to do!

This month, that being June of 2020, I’d like to look at doing the following:

  • Add something cool to the homepage, to accompany links to my THM/HTB/Twitter profiles etc.
  • Move this written stuff into a blog section and their own respective pages
  • Add breadcrumb URL’s to pages (I sort of know how to do this.. its the formatting that’s giving me a hard time).

If you stumbled here by accident, on purpose, or if you found any of my reference material useful, I always enjoy chatting to fellow hackers. Hit me up on Twitter @5ysk3y and check out my GitHub Page

5ysk3y
